properties.name: camel.component.minio.access-key
properties.description: Amazon AWS Secret Access Key or Minio Access Key. If not set camel will connect to service for anonymous access.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.auto-close-body
properties.description: If this option is true and includeBody is true, then the MinioObject.close() method will be called on exchange completion. This option is strongly related to includeBody option. In case of setting includeBody to true and autocloseBody to false, it will be up to the caller to close the MinioObject stream. Setting autocloseBody to true, will close the MinioObject stream automatically.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.auto-create-bucket
properties.description: Setting the autocreation of the bucket if bucket name not exist.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.bridge-error-handler
properties.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions (if possible) occurred while the Camel consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. Important: This is only possible if the 3rd party component allows Camel to be alerted if an exception was thrown. Some components handle this internally only, and therefore bridgeErrorHandler is not possible. In other situations we may improve the Camel component to hook into the 3rd party component and make this possible for future releases. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.bypass-governance-mode
properties.description: Set this flag if you want to bypassGovernanceMode when deleting a particular object.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.configuration
properties.description: The component configuration. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.minio.MinioConfiguration type.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.custom-http-client
properties.description: Set custom HTTP client for authenticated access. The option is a okhttp3.OkHttpClient type.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.delete-after-read
properties.description: Delete objects from Minio after they have been retrieved. The delete is only performed if the Exchange is committed. If a rollback occurs, the object is not deleted. If this option is false, then the same objects will be retrieve over and over again on the polls. Therefore you need to use the Idempotent Consumer EIP in the route to filter out duplicates. You can filter using the MinioConstants#BUCKET_NAME and MinioConstants#OBJECT_NAME headers, or only the MinioConstants#OBJECT_NAME header.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.delete-after-write
properties.description: Delete file object after the Minio file has been uploaded.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.delimiter
properties.description: The delimiter which is used in the ListObjectsRequest to only consume objects we are interested in.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.destination-bucket-name
properties.description: Destination bucket name.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.destination-object-name
properties.description: Destination object name.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the minio component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.endpoint
properties.description: Endpoint can be an URL, domain name, IPv4 address or IPv6 address.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.health-check-consumer-enabled
properties.description: Used for enabling or disabling all consumer based health checks from this component

properties.name: camel.component.minio.health-check-producer-enabled
properties.description: Used for enabling or disabling all producer based health checks from this component. Notice: Camel has by default disabled all producer based health-checks. You can turn on producer checks globally by setting camel.health.producersEnabled=true.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.include-body
properties.description: If it is true, the exchange body will be set to a stream to the contents of the file. If false, the headers will be set with the Minio object metadata, but the body will be null. This option is strongly related to autocloseBody option. In case of setting includeBody to true and autocloseBody to false, it will be up to the caller to close the MinioObject stream. Setting autocloseBody to true, will close the MinioObject stream automatically.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.include-folders
properties.description: The flag which is used in the ListObjectsRequest to set include folders.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.include-user-metadata
properties.description: The flag which is used in the ListObjectsRequest to get objects with user meta data.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.include-versions
properties.description: The flag which is used in the ListObjectsRequest to get objects with versioning.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.key-name
properties.description: Setting the key name for an element in the bucket through endpoint parameter.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.length
properties.description: Number of bytes of object data from offset.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.match-e-tag
properties.description: Set match ETag parameter for get object(s).

properties.name: camel.component.minio.max-connections
properties.description: Set the maxConnections parameter in the minio client configuration

properties.name: camel.component.minio.max-messages-per-poll
properties.description: Gets the maximum number of messages as a limit to poll at each polling. Gets the maximum number of messages as a limit to poll at each polling. The default value is 10. Use 0 or a negative number to set it as unlimited.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.minio-client
properties.description: Reference to a Minio Client object in the registry. The option is a io.minio.MinioClient type.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.modified-since
properties.description: Set modified since parameter for get object(s).

properties.name: camel.component.minio.move-after-read
properties.description: Move objects from bucket to a different bucket after they have been retrieved. To accomplish the operation the destinationBucket option must be set. The copy bucket operation is only performed if the Exchange is committed. If a rollback occurs, the object is not moved.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.not-match-e-tag
properties.description: Set not match ETag parameter for get object(s).

properties.name: camel.component.minio.object-lock
properties.description: Set when creating new bucket.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.object-name
properties.description: To get the object from the bucket with the given object name.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.offset
properties.description: Start byte position of object data.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.operation
properties.description: The operation to do in case the user don't want to do only an upload.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.pojo-request
properties.description: If we want to use a POJO request as body or not.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.policy
properties.description: The policy for this queue to set in the method.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.prefix
properties.description: Object name starts with prefix.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.proxy-port
properties.description: TCP/IP port number. 80 and 443 are used as defaults for HTTP and HTTPS.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.recursive
properties.description: List recursively than directory structure emulation.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.region
properties.description: The region in which Minio client needs to work. When using this parameter, the configuration will expect the lowercase name of the region (for example ap-east-1). You'll need to use the name Region.EU_WEST_1.id()

properties.name: camel.component.minio.secret-key
properties.description: Amazon AWS Access Key Id or Minio Secret Key. If not set camel will connect to service for anonymous access.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.secure
properties.description: Flag to indicate to use secure connection to minio service or not.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.server-side-encryption
properties.description: Server-side encryption. The option is a io.minio.ServerSideEncryption type.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.server-side-encryption-customer-key
properties.description: Server-side encryption for source object while copy/move objects. The option is a io.minio.ServerSideEncryptionCustomerKey type.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.start-after
properties.description: list objects in bucket after this object name.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.storage-class
properties.description: The storage class to set in the request.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.un-modified-since
properties.description: Set un modified since parameter for get object(s).

properties.name: camel.component.minio.use-version1
properties.description: when true, version 1 of REST API is used.

properties.name: camel.component.minio.version-id
properties.description: Set specific version_ID of a object when deleting the object.
